rag_v2_output: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{endpoint="/order/cancel", status!~"500"}[30m:5m]) by (le)) order by le desc limit 5
rag_v6_output:
5 * histogram_quantile(0.05, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket[30m])) by (le, endpoint)) 
  and (
    label_replace(
      histogram_quantile(0.05, sum(rate(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket[30m])) by (le, endpoint)),
      "endpoint", "$1", "endpoint", "(.*/order/cancel$)"
    ) != "500"
  )

llama_3.1_8b_without_rag: sum(container_memory_usage_bytes{container_name="db-backend", namespace=~".*", container_label!="log", container_label!="tmp"}) - sum(container_memory_usage_bytes{container_name="db-backend", namespace=~".*", container_label!="log", container_label!="tmp", job!="prometheus"})
rag_v1_output: sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes{instance=~"db-backend", label!="__name__", label!="log", label!="temp"} - node_filesystem_free_bytes{instance=~"db-backend", label!="__name__", label!="log", label!="temp"}) offset 10m
rag_v3_output: sum(node_filesystem_size_bytes - node_filesystem_free_bytes) by (instance) and (fstype) and (match{kubernetes_filesystem_name="db-backend"}) offset 10m
